trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.
